description.originalText: Our family interviewed Alicia at our home and we found to her be exceptional. She was warm, energetic, positive, and clearly experienced with all ages. It only came down to timing that we were not able to hire Alicia, but she would be an asset to any family who hires her.

description.displayText: Alicia has been amazing with our girls, especially during pandemic times when things have just been hectic.   And they ADORE her which is always a phenomenal sign as a parent. She has adjusted to the shifting schedules of the girls.  She's dependable, always on time (if not early), gets creative with the girls in terms of activities, takes them to their activities, helps with lunches and dinners, and helps with their laundry.  All around, we've been very happy with her and recommend her highly!
description.originalText: Alicia has been amazing with our girls, especially during pandemic times when things have just been hectic.   And they ADORE her which is always a phenomenal sign as a parent. She has adjusted to the shifting schedules of the girls.  She's dependable, always on time (if not early), gets creative with the girls in terms of activities, takes them to their activities, helps with lunches and dinners, and helps with their laundry.  All around, we've been very happy with her and recommend her highly!

description.displayText: Alicia was not only a great Nanny but she became like part of our family. She is responsible, warm, caring and hard working. She goes above and beyond her duties and loves what she does. My son was well cared for and I was always happy knowing he was in good hands. Best Nanny we ever had!
description.originalText: Alicia was not only a great Nanny but she became like part of our family. She is responsible, warm, caring and hard working. She goes above and beyond her duties and loves what she does. My son was well cared for and I was always happy knowing he was in good hands. Best Nanny we ever had!

description.displayText:
She wrote me 2 nasty disparaging emails - see below.

Re: Family Helper Needed !!
This job sounds excellent for a fun loving nanny like myself but I have one tattoo on my wrist that can't be hidden and a nose piercing but I am a wonderful nanny so I don't understand why that would be an issue?? Please explain I'm open minded and love open communication.
Thanks 
I wrote back...I told her the truth - we work with old people & they are scared of that look ... she wrote back...
Re:Re: Family Helper Needed !!
Oh I see. Honestly for you to say that old people are afraid of tattoos n piercings is a little shallow. I can't believe that in this day n age there are still people judging others by their looks or how they choose to express themselves. I would never want to work for a family like this. Its plain out sad. Hope u find a gorgeous woman that meets your expectations without piercings or tattoos. Who the person is on the inside n how they treat your children should be priority. I really hope this is not what you are teaching your children!! Best of luck 

I reported her to the site.
